plot: A Bro-Mantic comedy about two Lifeguards who, when confronted with the end of summer, are forced to make adult decisions whether they like it or not.
title: Trust Me, I'm a Lifeguard
plot_es: A Bro-Mantic comedy about two Lifeguards who, when confronted with the end of summer, are forced to make adult decisions whether they like it or not.
plot_en: A Bro-Mantic comedy about two Lifeguards who, when confronted with the end of summer, are forced to make adult decisions whether they like it or not.
